implemented by checking for invalid email address using JavaScript regular expression validation For existing users this feature was implemented by validating the presence of email address in their profiles by using SQL queries and redirecting them to a new JSP implementation to obtain their respective email address The provided email address was updated in the database and in LDAP directory as
